question: I am 18+ and consent to take part. I understand anonymised data will be published openly.
description: Consent to participate and allow anonymised data to be published.
values: Allowed values: yes (stored as 'yes'; original raw label: 'Yes').

question: How often do you use digital or AI-powered tools (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot, Gemini, AI-enhanced search) in your daily life?
description: Frequency of using AI-powered or digital tools in daily life.
values: Allowed values (stored as snake_case): never, rarely, sometimes, occasionally, often, very_often, everyday.

question: On average, how many hours do you spend online each day? (self-estimate)
description: Estimated number of hours spent online per day.
values: Allowed values (stored as snake_case categories): lt_2_hours, 2_4_hours, 5_6_hours, 7_8_hours, 9_10_hours, 11_12_hours, gt_12_hours.

question: What do you use AI for most often? (Select all that apply)
description: Primary use cases of AI tools (multi-select).
values: Multi-select; stored as semicolon-separated snake_case tokens: academic_validity, asked_by_teacher, coding_scripting, creative_projects, customer_service_interaction, decision_making, emotional_support, entertainment, information_research, learning_studying, life_advice, life_decisions, none, text_summarising_formatting, translating, work_tasks, writing_messages, writing_tasks. Note: raw tokens 'Information or research' and 'research' were both normalised to 'information_research'.

question: In general, how confident do you feel using AI tools?
description: Self-rated confidence using AI tools.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not confident at all ; 7 = Extremely confident

question: AI providing health or wellbeing advice.
description: Perceived risk associated with AI giving health or wellbeing advice.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not risky at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Extremely risky

question: AI making recommendations about money or finance.
description: Perceived risk of AI giving financial recommendations.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not risky at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Extremely risky

question: AI influencing work-related decisions.
description: Perceived risk associated with AI influencing work decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not risky at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Extremely risky

question: AI interacting with children or young people.
description: Perceived risk associated with AI interacting with children.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not risky at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Extremely risky

question: AI generating information that might be inaccurate.
description: Perceived risk of AI generating inaccurate information.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not risky at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Extremely risky

question: AI forming opinions about someone based on personal data.
description: Perceived risk of AI forming opinions using personal data.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not risky at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Extremely risky

question: An AI tool taking small actions independently (e.g. drafting content without asking).
description: Perceived risk of autonomous AI actions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: An AI tool making decisions for you when you haven't given explicit approval.
description: Perceived risk of AI making decisions without approval.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: An AI tool remembering past conversations and using them to guide new ones.
description: Perceived risk associated with AI using conversational memory.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: An AI tool suggesting actions you did not expect or ask for.
description: Perceived risk from unexpected AI suggestions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: I feel uneasy when an AI tool responds inconsistently to the same question.
description: Unease caused by inconsistent AI responses.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: Sudden changes in tone or behaviour from AI make me question its reliability.
description: Concern about AI reliability due to tone/behaviour shifts.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I prefer AI tools that behave predictably, even if they are less powerful.
description: Preference for predictability in AI behaviour.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: AI talking in a highly emotional or personal way.
description: Comfort level with emotionally expressive AI behaviour.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: AI using personal details to tailor responses.
description: Comfort level with AI personalisation.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: AI giving strong opinions about sensitive topics.
description: Comfort level with AI expressing strong opinions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: AI becoming overly confident in its answers.
description: Comfort level with overconfident AI behaviour.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very uncomfortable ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: I sometimes overlook potential risks because AI tools make my tasks easier.
description: Tendency to overlook risks due to AI convenience.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: The convenience of AI is worth accepting some level of uncertainty.
description: Willingness to accept uncertainty in exchange for AI convenience.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: An AI tool offering guidance during a stressful moment (e.g., conflict, crisis, decision pressure).
description: Comfort level with AI guidance during stressful moments.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not comfortable at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: An AI tool proactively warning you about potential risks in your behaviour.
description: Comfort level with AI issuing proactive warnings.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not comfortable at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: An AI tool predicting your future choices based on past interactions.
description: Comfort level with AI predicting future behaviour.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not comfortable at all ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Very comfortable

question: I expect AI systems to become safer over time.
description: Expectation that AI will improve in safety.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I am more concerned about future AI than the AI we have today.
description: Concern level about future AI development.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Strongly disagree ; 4 = Neutral ; 7 = Strongly agree

question: I double-check AI information with other sources.
description: Frequency of verifying AI-generated information.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Never ; 4 = Sometimes ; 7 = Always

question: I avoid certain questions or topics with AI because I'm unsure how it will respond.
description: Frequency of avoiding topics with AI.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Never ; 4 = Sometimes ; 7 = Always

question: I reduce how much I use AI when it feels unpredictable or confusing.
description: Frequency of reducing AI use when unpredictable.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Never ; 4 = Sometimes ; 7 = Always

question: Is there anything else you want to share about how you feel regarding AI safety or risk? (Optional)
description: Open-ended feedback about AI safety or perceived risk.
values: Open-text responses describing participants' thoughts or concerns about AI safety. Minimal cleaning applied (whitespace trimming, newline removal). Raw wording preserved exactly. Empty string indicates no response.

question: How much do you trust AI systems to act in your best interests?
description: Level of trust in AI acting in usersâ€™ best interests.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not at all ; 7 = Completely

question: How clear do you feel about what matters most in your life right now?
description: Self-rated clarity about personal values and priorities.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not clear at all ; 7 = Extremely clear

question: How much does modern digital life affect your ability to focus, decide, or think clearly?
description: Impact of digital life on cognitive clarity.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Not at all ; 7 = Very strongly

question: How do you feel about the growing role of AI in everyday decision-making?
description: Emotional evaluation of AI's role in everyday decisions.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very negative ; 7 = Very positive

question: Which values do you believe AI systems should reflect? (select up 3)
description: Values participants believe AI systems should reflect (multi-select).
values: Multi-select; stored as semicolon-separated snake_case tokens: honesty, empathy, fairness, respect, responsibility, human_wellbeing, non_harm, transparency, accountability.

question: What is your age group?
description: Participant age group.

question: Which of the following best describes your gender?
description: Participant gender identity.
values: Allowed values: man, woman, non_binary, prefer_not_to_say.

question: Country of residence.
description: Participant country of residence.
values: Allowed values (ISO-like codes): au, ca, ie, nz, uk, us.

question: What is your highest level of education?
description: Highest level of education completed.
values: Allowed values: less_than_high_school, high_school, some_university_college, bachelors_degree, postgraduate_degree, other.

question: Which of the following best describes your current work status?
description: Participant employment or occupational status.
values: Allowed values: student, employed_full_time, employed_part_time, self_employed, not_currently_working, other.

question: How would you describe your general emotional wellbeing?
description: Self-rated emotional wellbeing.
values: Scale 1-7 1 = Very poor ; 7 = Excellent

question: Other values participants believe AI systems should reflect.
description: Free-text entries supplied under the 'Other' option.
values: Open-text responses not matching predefined multi-select values.
